title: After roughly 7 months of tough work, I finally finished an app for us to easily compare our stats

embed.description: League of Legends app for easily comparing in-game stats and player performance.

body:
i**OS Users:** Due to the time constraints of being a full-time student and looking for full-time employment, I can't begin working on the iOS version until after I graduate this December. An iOS version will absolutely be developed in the future.  

**Google Play:** https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.quadrastats&hl=en
The source for the app as well as details regarding app usage.  

**Website:** http://quadrastats.com
This provides a visual overview of what the app has to offer. There is a chance the site won't be up because it's not setup to handle a heavy load. The site was made mainly as part of the application approval process.  

**Getting Started:** Once the app is downloaded, open it and click the "No account yet? Register" text to move to the registration form. Fill out the form and hit register. Afterwards, a code will pop up. Replace the name of one of your rune pages with this code to verify ownership of the summoner account. Wait a few seconds, hit submit, and enjoy the app.  

**About:** QuadraStats is all about comparing ranked stats between players. For those who may not have a group of friends to compare stats to, there is always the ability to compare yourself to the pros. I believe QuadraStats holds value to all ranked players whether you seek to improve your game or simply want to brag to your friends about how much better you are at dropping wards.  

Please try out the app and share any comments or concerns.

replies.body: I have no idea what this is, but I am staying away until I see a Rioter say it's alright to use without risk of being banned.

It's simply a mobile app to make comparing stats between you and friends, pros, etc. much easier. The idea came to me when I realized that having 5+ op.gg/lolking tabs open is simply annoying and not doable on mobile. This app makes it easier to compare fine grain stats.  

Edit: This uses the Riot API and was Riot approved so it is 100% safe to use :) I hope you decide to try it out and enjoy the experience.

riot doesnt ban people for using information tools.... ever. you would only be at risk of ban if the program was installed on your computer and interfered with your controls or modded the game. none of these are true here
Why would you get banned for using a Riot API that they have to approve for this app to even exist?
Looking forward to the iOS version :)

Stay hyped :D because I cant wait to begin working on it. The iOS release will also include many really cool features (which will be added android too of course!) 

As long as you have your eyes and ears on League you wont miss the iOS release.
honestly...thank you
Thank YOU and I hope you enjoy the app :)

Sounds like a pretty cool app I'll have to download it when I get home. Do you have the ability to compare yourself to the average player of a given rank (i.e. could you compare your stats to the average plat player?) If not do you think you could incorporate that functionality into a future build?

Thanks and I hope you enjoy the app :)   

Unfortunately you cannot compare yourself to the average X player. I will absolutely look into getting that information for a future release. If I had to guess it just takes time and database space so it should not actually be too expensive.

How to isolate yourself from your league friends through elitism! :')

The stats are pretty cool though. I mean, I don't really have a use for it, but the effort is always appreciated. People are gonna be wary at first though, just sayin'.

Thank you for your feedback and I definitely understand why people would be cautious. I hope I can help people be more open to giving it a try because I really feel people would enjoy it once they fot used to it.  

If I had more time I wouldve added a tutorial because the app has so much information and hidden click-enabled features that it is easy to get lost.
This looks awesome, looking forward to the iOS version, make sure you post here again when it's ready to go. Appreciate all the effort, great idea
Nice

Just a shame that stats don't be mean crap this season
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Stats are always fun and relevent given the right context :D This app is all about giving stats context.  

This app is designed mainly for people who play directly with friends but even if you dont I hope you give it a try.

I was making a jab at this Ranked Season and it's competitive integrity being undermined by the sheer principle of Dynamic Queue. Yes it's a Samba we've danced before but it's never going to be irrelevant until that Q system is killed.

Regardless, stats have always had context I'm not sure why you've made the notion they don't :P Especially given that pretty much every other statistics website out there allows you to compare to others, even if by simply opening a second window.

(Not dismissing your work mind, don't misinterpret it as that.)
Thats fair lol. Definitely no offense taken, this app was born because Im sick of opening tabs and its rly hard on mobile lol.
So open tabs in a browser xD

If you are looking for further develop and maintain the application, it might be worth looking into Cordova and the Ionic Framework.  

I may a multi-platform application development simpler and with less redundant coding.
